title: Accessibility Checklist
creator: Elsevier
description: Accessibility Checklist provides an easy way to explore the most relevant guidelines using a simplified language framework and easy to explore user interface.  Users can filter guidelines by topic such as images, keyboard, and forms.  Users can also filter by standard levels such as A, AA, or AAA.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
